label: 中間
本: State of War: the Violent Order of Fourteenth Century Japan . Michigan University Press . 2003
説明文: Those obligated to serve a lord in battle, or perform various menial duties, but lacking surname. Comprising men otherwise known as bonge or genin, chūgen could be granted surnames, and concomitant samurai rank, as a result of battle service. [凡下、下人、中間]
